description:
"Prison Break" is back from the dead, y'all. The prison-centered drama is being revived as a limited series over at FOX.《越狱》要复活了。这部监狱题材美剧将会被FOX电视台开发成一部限制剧。

If it returns, it will only be 12 or so episodes, reports TVLine. As of right now, there's no news as to whether or not Wentworth Miller and Dominic Purcell will return as their original characters: Michael Scofield and Lincoln Burrows, respectively.如果《越狱》成功俘获，集数可能只有12集左右。目前还没有Wentworth Miller和Dominic Purcell是否会回归复活剧并扮演原剧两位主角的相关消息。

Earlier in 2015, Miller and Purcell told E! News that they "floated the idea" of a revival to FOX and that the network was "maybe definitely" excited about it, which means there's a possibility "Prison Break"s' Lincoln and Michael might return. Until then, they'll always have "The Flash" and "Legends of Tomorrow."在2015年年初，Miller和Purcell就向《E！News》透露，他们有让FOX复活《越狱》的想法，而电视台对这个想法也表示出了相当大的兴趣，也就是说《越狱》的Lincoln和Michael真的很可能会随着剧集的复活而回归。目前，他们两人都在《闪电侠》和《明日传奇》中出演。
